children.text: Your phone number (For test purposes - WhatsApp)
Your phone number (For test purposes - SMS)
Please enter your Account SID here:

- Find your Account SID on the dashboard of your account. - Find your Active numbers from Phone Numbers > Manage > Active Numbers on your dashboard. - Twilio API Docs: www.twilio.com/docs/api - API Authentication Docs: www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api
The WhatsApp messages have been sent!
Select all the customers you want to send messages to
Please select a customer from the "Customers" tab in order to configure a message.
Please configure a message and a messaging channel for the customers from the 'Configure' tab to preview the message
